attributes.action: stand down from goverment and form a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to request godon brown to stand down from govermant and allow the people of this country to have a general election and form a govermant that will bring us out of this resession and not take us further in to a pit that will endower the jobs, lives and the safety of this country we call home

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
